resources.string: An accomplished Architect And Interior Designer for over more than 15 years... His diverse design experience includes various commercial and residential projects.
Ayman Ferjany, is owner and principal of Rajany Designs, an experienced and specialized design firm located in Cairo, Egypt.

His commercial work encompasses club and amenity centers, restaurants, automobile showrooms and corporate offices, while his residential work includes custom and model homes, from new construction to remodeling design.
Ayman opened his first design firm in 1997. Over the past 15 years, he has led the vision and goals for Rajany Designs and the firm has flourished into one of the respected and diverse design firms.

Our staff includes a talented, educated and experienced design team with over 15 years of combined design experience. Our designers participate regularly in continuing education classes and frequently attend professional trade shows and design conferences to bring current design trends, technology and best business practices to our clients. Our administrative support staff works closely with the design team to provide our clients a professionally managed and highly detailed process.

As an architectural firm, Rajany Designs is active in the broadest fields of architecture. Our project portfolio covers every aspect of architecture and design, ranging from small to large scale projects, research and theory. The atmosphere within our office is multidisciplinary and ambitious, but also open, non hierarchical, team based and friendly, with attention to personal well being, knowledge development and career planning.

When vacancies arise, Rajany Designs is always interested in offering positions to exceptional architects and technicians who are committed to high quality design. We currently have a wide range of projects providing front-end design opportunities for talented individuals. Rajany Designs is always interested in motivated people with an enthusiastic approach and a high profile and experience in designing, rendering, 3D modeling, technical knowledge, (building) coordination. Our aim is a long term commitment and durable employment. We don’t have vacancies all the time, but applications are always welcome. Please send digital applications only (Arabic/English) via email (info@rajany.com).
Visuals of your work (designs, technical drawings) and CV (including personal data, experience, and software knowledge).

Good knowledge of English. Exceptional CAD/3D skills and interest in the latest developments. Please be clear in your communications and put your name on all the material you send us, so things won’t get lost. Give us an as broad as possible overview of your experience and knowledge. Thorough technical knowledge and practical building experience is much appreciated. Response will normally take up to two weeks and longer during holidays
we are an experienced and specialized Residential and Hospitality Interior Design Firm dedicated to creating distinct interior environments in which we live, work and play.
we deliver quality, value and performance driven design based on years of experience, education and dedication to professional Interior Design.
from spirited entertaining to intimate relaxation, an environment that fits your needs is the ultimate luxury.
we provide turn-key planning, design details, construction drawings, interior finishes, furniture and accessory selection, procurement and installation.
we create design solutions for custom homes and remodeling projects, condominiums, amenity centers and clubhouses to express your sensibilities and meet your specific needs.
An investment in design provides value and will create a place that supports your business, family and life for years to come.
we focus on delivering the quality and value of your project within your schedule and budget that puts your expectations first.
we seamlessly integrate Interior Design and Architecture in a coordinated process involving the Client, the design team and construction professionals.
From timeless classics to the latest trends we will find the right selections for your style and your interior design projects.
With studio offices, Rajany Designs provides the vision, the design and the process to reach your goals!
